Posts.EditableText: I can´t play my new game online: http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/ ... -maker-1-0 It's stuck on "loading". Help?
Posts.HTML:
I can´t play my new game online:

http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/ ... -maker-1-0

It's stuck on "loading".

Help?

Posts.EditableText:
Check the console in your browser. You'll see it's missing a .js file:

[code:4yxq2d3c]
Failed to load resource: the server responded with a status of 404 (The specified blob does not exist.) http://textadventures.blob.core.windows.net/gameresources/dbd94bee-83bd-4fc9-a0f1-34fd923192ec/elizadata.js
[/code:4yxq2d3c]
